plpng and pltabpng

plpng, pltabpng

DESCRIPTION

plpng is used by pl for PNG functionality. Similarly, pltabpng is used for the same purpose by pltab. When pl is executed with the -png option, the pl process does an execvp() to plpng.

plpng's usage and command line arguments are identical to those of pl. Likewise, pltabpng and pltab.

Markup created by unroff 1.0,    January 15, 2001.
